title: I'm 28 and My Mom Is 58—Holiday Gifts We'd Both Love to Unwrap
description: Our eyes are on this Coach bag.
excerpt: From cozy cashmere sweaters to oxblood-colored bucket bags, these 24 fashion items make the perfect gift for every mother figure in your life.
text: (Image credit: Original Illustration by Kennedy Caldwell)Every cell in my body that is infatuated with shopping comes straight from my mother. Most of my childhood memories involve trips to Nordstrom, the smell of pretzels at the mall, and the crinkling sound of paper shopping bags. Yes, I read books and played at parks, but nothing was more formative than the time I spent shopping with her. The proof is that I ended up here, writing this holiday gift guide. The following 24 items are inspired by her, and I guarantee that any mother figure would also love to unwrap these gifts this season. I included the viral Coach bag, the softest cashmere you can imagine, cool sneakers, and the coats I would personally steal from my mom. The hardest part will be narrowing down what to purchase, but no matter what you decide, just know these have the mom stamp of approval. Keep scrolling to shop my latest gift guide. Banana Republic Cashmere Cable-Knit Sweater With Vented Back You can never go wrong with a cable-knit sweater as a gift. Madewell Oversized Double-Breasted Topcoat This is such a luxe winter coat for less than $500. Isabel Marant Etoile Beige & Khaki Deloris Jacket If I purchased this for my mom, I would move back home just so I could borrow it every day. Haven Well Within Cashmere Wide Leg Pants Introducing: the perfect lounge pants. St. Agni Black & Off-White Pillow Reversible Jacket The key word here is "reversible." We love a 2-for-1 here. Banana Republic Cashmere Turtleneck Midi Sweater Dress There's no such thing as too many cashmere gifts. Madewell Long-Sleeve Tie-Neck Top Classic, simple, and elegant. Madewell Flap-Pocket Field Jacket in Herringbone A utilitarian jacket made chic. I stole my mom's Coach backpack from the 90s, but I'll give her this one as a replacement. Madewell Medium Silk Bandana There are many ways to style this scarf, but I'd wrap this around one of the purses in this story. Etro Small Libra Tote Bag The tote bag of your mom's dreams. Etro Leather Credit Card Holder With Pegaso Might be a risk, but let's try to simplify her purse contents with this card holder. Coach Brooklyn Shoulder Bag 39 The bag taking the internet by storm. Madewell The Essential Micro Bucket Tote The color, the size, the style—this has my mom's name written all over it. Jimmy Choo Diamond Clasp Belt Okay, I might have thrown this one in for myself. Banana Republic Brushed Alpaca-Wool Blend Scarf Striped scarfs are so last year. Jenni Kayne Cashmere Socks A small gift, but one that will be treasured. Adidas sneakers are always a good idea. Clarks Originals Brown Trek Wedge Boots My mom grew up wearing Clarks Wallabees, so something tells me she'd love this grown-up version. Mansur Gavriel Dream Ballet Flats Another item that might make its way into my closet instead. adidas Handball Spezial Shoes The most versatile sneaker there is. Kelsi Dagger Brooklyn Franklin Clogs I love the buckle on these for added interest. Jimmy Choo Cece Ankle Boot 60 I'll end this list with the black ankle boots of everyone's dreams.
html:
Every cell in my body that is infatuated with shopping comes straight from my mother. Most of my childhood memories involve trips to Nordstrom, the smell of pretzels at the mall, and the crinkling sound of paper shopping bags. Yes, I read books and played at parks, but nothing was more formative than the time I spent shopping with her. The proof is that I ended up here, writing this holiday gift guide. The following 24 items are inspired by her, and I guarantee that any mother figure would also love to unwrap these gifts this season. I included the viral Coach bag, the softest cashmere you can imagine, cool sneakers, and the coats I would personally steal from my mom. The hardest part will be narrowing down what to purchase, but no matter what you decide, just know these have the mom stamp of approval. Keep scrolling to shop my latest gift guide.

Banana Republic

Cashmere Cable-Knit Sweater With Vented Back

You can never go wrong with a cable-knit sweater as a gift.

Madewell

Oversized Double-Breasted Topcoat

This is such a luxe winter coat for less than $500.

Isabel Marant Etoile

Beige & Khaki Deloris Jacket

If I purchased this for my mom, I would move back home just so I could borrow it every day.

Haven Well Within

Cashmere Wide Leg Pants

Introducing: the perfect lounge pants.

St. Agni

Black & Off-White Pillow Reversible Jacket

The key word here is "reversible." We love a 2-for-1 here.

Banana Republic

Cashmere Turtleneck Midi Sweater Dress

There's no such thing as too many cashmere gifts.

Madewell

Long-Sleeve Tie-Neck Top

Classic, simple, and elegant.

Madewell

Flap-Pocket Field Jacket in Herringbone

A utilitarian jacket made chic.

I stole my mom's Coach backpack from the 90s, but I'll give her this one as a replacement.

Madewell

Medium Silk Bandana

There are many ways to style this scarf, but I'd wrap this around one of the purses in this story.

Etro

Small Libra Tote Bag

The tote bag of your mom's dreams.

Etro

Leather Credit Card Holder With Pegaso

Might be a risk, but let's try to simplify her purse contents with this card holder.

Coach

Brooklyn Shoulder Bag 39

The bag taking the internet by storm.

Madewell

The Essential Micro Bucket Tote

The color, the size, the style—this has my mom's name written all over it.

Jimmy Choo

Diamond Clasp Belt

Okay, I might have thrown this one in for myself.

Banana Republic

Brushed Alpaca-Wool Blend Scarf

Striped scarfs are so last year.

Jenni Kayne

Cashmere Socks

A small gift, but one that will be treasured.

Adidas sneakers are always a good idea.

Clarks Originals

Brown Trek Wedge Boots

My mom grew up wearing Clarks Wallabees, so something tells me she'd love this grown-up version.

Mansur Gavriel

Dream Ballet Flats

Another item that might make its way into my closet instead.

adidas

Handball Spezial Shoes

The most versatile sneaker there is.

Kelsi Dagger Brooklyn

Franklin Clogs

I love the buckle on these for added interest.

Jimmy Choo

Cece Ankle Boot 60

I'll end this list with the black ankle boots of everyone's dreams.
